name: Speedy Gonzales
overview: "Arriba, Arriba, Andale, Andale!" The world's fastest mouse must rescue his friends, all mouse-napped by evil King Rat! To pay the ransom, Speedy must collect as much cheese as he can. Guide Speedy through six treacherous territories. Find helpful switches that turn fans on and off blowing you to the next level. Get around the most difficult obstacles by using the incredible U-Loops to defy gravity and actually triple your speed. Prepare yourself for the ultimate cheese challenge!
